title: [Snyk] SNYK-JS-FASTXMLPARSER-15324289 in fast-xml-parser@4.4.1
description:
## Incorrect Regular Expression

**Severity:** high
**Package:** fast-xml-parser@4.4.1
**File:** `dashboard/package.json`

**CVSS Score:** 7.8  
**Exploit Maturity:** proof-of-concept  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 783/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2026-25896](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2026-25896)

**Fix:** Pin `fast-xml-parser` to version 5.3.5 or later.

### Details
## Overview
[fast-xml-parser](https://www.npmjs.org/package/fast-xml-parser) is a Validate XML, Parse XML, Build XML without C/C++ based libraries

Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Incorrect Regular Expression in the entity parsing RegEx in DOCTYPE declarations. An attacker can inject arbitrary values that override built-in XML entities by crafting entity names containing `.`, which is interpreted as a regex wildcard, allowing malicious content to be substituted in place of standard entities when the XML is parsed and subsequently rendered or used in sensitive contexts.
## Remediation
Upgrade `fast-xml-parser` to version 5.3.5 or higher.
## References
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/NaturalIntelligence/fast-xml-parser/commit/943ef0eb1b2d3284e72dd74f44a042ee9f07026e)
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/NaturalIntelligence/fast-xml-parser/commit/ddcd0acf26ddd682cb0dc15a2bd6aa3b96bb1e69)
- [GitHub Release](https://github.com/NaturalIntelligence/fast-xml-parser/releases/tag/v5.3.5)

- [Snyk advisory](https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-FASTXMLPARSER-15324289)
